summary: Theoretical mathematician, Nigel Kline finds himself the subject of his own vertical time study. Entering into Einstein's relativity, three versions of Nigel face off with each other, weaving time and space in a world of fluid moments.
cast: Alvin Aki|Jodi Chase|Aleksandra Chernova|Aviva Christie|R. John D II|Carol Halliburton|Banks Helfrich|Grant Jordan|Cindy Karr|Skeet Karsgaard|Annie Kidwell|Andrew Knight|John Archer Lundgren|Jesse Malinowski|Julian Elijah Martinez|Susan O'Gara|Dina Peterson|Susan Sarricchio|Diane W. Saunders|Robyn Scrivener|Trevor Simoneau
title: The Ah of Life
